Detailed Description

MediaRecorderListener specifies the methods used to notify the status of the MediaRecorder during the media recording events.

The following example demonstrates how to use the MediaRecorderListener

 // MyMediaRecorderListener

 class MyMediaRecorderListener : MediaRecorderListener {
 public:
     MyMediaRecorderListener();
     virtual ~MyMediaRecorderListener();
     void onError(MediaRecorder* mr, int what, int extra);
 };


 // MyMediaRecorderListener

 void MyMediaRecorderListener::onError(MediaRecorder* mr, int what, int extra) {
    // release the resource
    mr->release();

 }


 MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const savedInstanceState){
     // new a instance
     MediaRecorder *mr = new MediaRecorder();

     // new a listener
     MyMediaRecorderListener *mrl = new MyMediaRecorderListener();

     // set a listener
     mr->setListener(mrl);

     // ...

 }
